intro: Liabum jussieui, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its velvety, waxy leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows as a compact shrub, with upright stems and clustered leaves. Its flowers come in a variety of colors, including purple, pink, and white, and bloom throughout the year under proper care. Liabum jussieui is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
